instructions:
Create a `string_utils.py` module with:
1. `reverse(text)` - Reverse a string
2. `count_vowels(text)` - Count vowels
3. Test code in `if __name__ == '__main__':`

hints.text: reverse: text[::-1], count_vowels: sum(1 for char in text.lower() if char in 'aeiou')

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
